content.description:
A Request for Guidance

Soleo,1 Domine, omnia de quibus dubitodubito, -are: to be uncertain ad te referre. 
Quis enim potest melius vel cunctationemcunctatio, -onis, f.: hesitation meam 
regere vel ignorantiamignorantia, -ae, f.: ignorance instruereinstruo, -ere: to inform?
 1:The subject of Soleo is Pliny the Younger.↩
content.question: Quis enim potest (line 2) is translated

choices.label: Do these things in fact have power

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
